comment.body: @Nekocross: We Chinese people want freedom, want democracy, we hate the Communist Party, they are devils, they are a huge threat to the peace of the whole world. We want to fight against them, but we don't have a single gun. We need your help. With your help we will win this time !

@Flyman: In China, the Communist Party controls the internet and all social networks. Due to Chinaâ€™s internet censorship, Google,YouTube,Facebook and Twitter are all banned in China. People may be sent to prison if they said something the Communist Party dislike on the internet. Many people shut their mouths consciously.
